content.rendered:
Directed by Ashutosh Gowariker

Written by Ranjeet Bahadur. Ashok Chakradhar. Chandrashekhar Dhavalikar. Ashutosh Gowariker. Ashutosh Gowariker. Aditya Rawal. Aditya Rawal. Guru Thakur

Cast Arjun Kapoor (Sadashiv Rao Bhau). Sanjay Dutt (Ahmad Shah Abdali). Kriti Sanon (Parvati Bai). Mohnish Behl (Nana Saheb (Balaji Baji Rao)). Padmini Kolhapure (Gopika Bai). Suhasini Mulay (Radha Bai). Zeenat Aman (Sakina Begum). Sahil Salathia (Shamsher Bahadur). Mantra Mugdh (Najib-ud-Daula (as Mantra)). Nawab Shah (Ibrahim Khan Gardi). Vinita Joshi (Mehram Bai). Ravindra Mahajani (Malhar Rao Holkar). Kunal Kapoor (Shuja-ud-Daula). Gashmeer Mahajani (Jankoji Shinde). Archana Nipankar (Anandi Bai) . Rajesh Aher (Sardar Biniwale). Babrak Akbari (Wasi Khubas). Tasneem Ali (Kriti’s Mother). Mohitt Anand (Taimur Shah Abdali (as Mohit. D. Anand)). Manoj Bakshi (Suraj Mal). Arun Bali (Ala Singh). Sharad Bhutadiya (Shankar Shastri). Karamveer Choudhary (King Karamveer (as Karmveer Choudhary)). Cricknowle (Raja vansh). Shailesh Datar (Gunoji Pant). Krutika Deo (Radhika Bai). Vivek Dutta (Shahjahan-3). Fahim Fazli (Shaa barikzoy). Sunny Ghansani (Suleiman-ud-Daula). Milind Gunaji (Dattaji Shinde). Honey (Murtaza). Bilal Hussein (Yakub Khan). Tejveer Singh Jhala (Bijay Singh). Rishabh Khanna (Udey Rathor).Vishal Kumar. Shyam Mashalkar (Bhanu). Abhishek Nigam (Vishwas Rao). Bimal Oberoi (Madho Singh). Kashyap Parulekar (Raghunath Rao). Ahmed Jawed Khan Pathaan (Barkhurdaar Khan). Ahmad Jawed Khan Pathan (Barkhurdar Khan (as Ahmad Jawed Khan Pathaan)). Pradeep Patwardhan (Lingoji Narayan). Farukh Saeed (Sarfaraz). Mir Sarwar (Imad-ul-Mulk). Ajit Shidhaye (Wazir Shah Wali Khan). Paresh Shukla (Govind Pant Bundele). Jasvinder Singh (Wahab Khan). Amir Tadwalkar (Maratha Court Announcer). Sagar Talashikar (Sardar Raaste). Dnyanesh Wadekar (Mehendale). Dushyant Wagh (Nana Phadnavis). S.M. Zaheer (Alamgir 2)

Languages Hindi

Producers Rajesh Bhatt. Sunita Gowariker. Rohit Shelatkar. Alok Sinha

Production Ashutosh Gowariker Production. Vision World Film. Zee Music Company
